title: Propulsion Fundamentals Assignment
description:
This assignment requires a detailed derivation of propulsion equations and a case study analysis.
Include at least two worked-out example problems and discuss the limitations of ideal rocket assumptions.

title: Combustion Analysis Report
description:
Prepare a multi-section report analyzing combustion stability.
Discuss real-world examples of combustion instability and propose mitigation strategies based on current research.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description:
Design a converging-diverging nozzle for a target altitude.
Include calculations, design drawings, and a short presentation summarizing your design choices and optimizations.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description:
Timed online quiz covering fundamental aerodynamic principles.
Expect questions on Bernoulli's equation, lift generation, and flow classification with both conceptual and numerical problems.

title: Flow Analysis Assignment
description:
Analyze subsonic and supersonic flow patterns over an airfoil.
Submit plots generated via simulation software and include an interpretation of results with emphasis on shock formation.

title: Aerodynamic Heating Report
description:
Write a detailed technical report on aerodynamic heating mechanisms.
Include real-world case studies, design considerations for TPS (Thermal Protection Systems), and calculations for heat flux.

title: Structural Design Task
description:
Perform structural analysis of a spacecraft component.
Document material selection, stress calculations, and provide a CAD model snapshot.

title: Orbital Calculations Homework
description:
Solve a set of orbital mechanics problems, including Hohmann transfers and delta-v budget calculations.
Show all steps clearly and provide any MATLAB or Python code used.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description:
Closed-book online exam covering spacecraft subsystems integration.
Questions will include short answers, design choices, and trade studies to evaluate engineering compromises.

title: Hydrocarbons Assignment
description:
Classify organic compounds by functional groups.
Draw structures, name according to IUPAC rules, and provide reaction examples.

title: Stereochemistry Problems
description:
Solve stereochemical configurations of molecules.
Include Fischer projections, R/S designations, and meso compound identification.

title: Organic Synthesis Planning
description:
Design a multistep synthesis for a target molecule.
Justify each reagent choice and reaction condition with literature references.

title: Coordination Complex Design
description:
Propose and describe the geometry and bonding of a novel coordination complex.
Include spectroscopic data interpretation and potential applications.

title: Bonding Theory Essay
description:
Write a detailed essay comparing crystal field theory and molecular orbital theory.
Use examples to illustrate differences in prediction and application.

title: Inorganic Chemistry Applications Report
description:
Prepare a report on real-world inorganic chemistry applications.
Focus on catalysis, materials science, and bioinorganic systems with case studies.

title: Thermodynamics Problem Set
description:
Solve problems involving first and second laws.
Include entropy calculations and Gibbs energy derivations.

title: Kinetics Data Analysis
description:
Analyze experimental rate data.
Plot concentration vs. time and determine rate constants using integrated forms.

title: Quantum Chemistry Essay
description:
Write an essay explaining key quantum mechanical principles.
Discuss wavefunctions, operators, and spectroscopic applications with equations.

title: Elvish Grammar Assignment
description:
Translate a passage into Quenya and Sindarin.
Provide grammatical analysis and commentary on differences between the two languages.

title: Dwarvish and Black Speech Exercise
description:
Decipher provided inscriptions in Khuzdul and Black Speech.
Offer transliterations and discuss cultural significance.

title: Philological Analysis Report
description:
Prepare a detailed philological analysis of selected Middle-earth texts.
Include language evolution, linguistic features, and historical context.

title: Diplomatic History Essay
description:
Write an essay analyzing key diplomatic events in Middle-earth history.
Focus on alliances, conflicts, and their long-term consequences.

title: Conflict Resolution Proposal
description:
Develop a plan to resolve an inter-species conflict scenario.
Include negotiation strategies and alliance-building techniques tailored to Middle-earth cultures.

title: Leadership Case Study
description:
Analyze leadership decisions during the War of the Ring.
Discuss the role of wisdom, sacrifice, and alliance in maintaining peace.
